title: CraftCommand: Notification System Update
notes: New: Integrated Notification System with persistent storage and real-time alerts.
New: Added Notification Bell to the header with unread badge and dropdown list.
New: Update checks now trigger system-wide notifications instead of dashboard banners.
New: Auto-pruning of old notifications to keep the system clean.
Optimization: Improved API performance for fetching notifications with pagination.
Fix: Resolved duplicate import issues in Header component.
